data.base_url_description: Enter the base URL for the Sensus Analytics API (e.g., https://api.sensus.com).
data.account_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics account (customer) number.
data.gas_meter_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics natural gas meter number.
data.gas_unit_type_description: Select the unit type. 'CCF' stands for 100 cubic feet and Therm stands for 100,000 BTUs.
data.gas_commodity_fixed_price_description: Enter the fixed price per therm for gas (e.g., 0.32).
data.gas_commodity_variable_price_description: Enter the variable price per therm for gas (e.g., 0.11).
data.gas_heat_content_factor: Variable heat content factor to convert natural gas between CCF and Therms
data.gas_heat_content_factor_description: Enter the heat content factor used to convert CCF to Therms (e.g., 1.025).
data.gas_service_fee_description: Enter the fixed natural gas service fee amount (e.g., 15.00).

data.base_url_description: Enter the base URL for the Sensus Analytics API (e.g., https://api.sensus.com).
data.account_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics account (customer) number.
data.gas_meter_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics natural gas meter number.
data.gas_unit_type_description: Select the unit type. 'CCF' stands for 100 cubic feet and Therm stands for 100,000 BTUs.
data.gas_commodity_fixed_price_description: Enter the fixed price per therm for gas (e.g., 0.32).
data.gas_commodity_variable_price_description: Enter the variable price per therm for gas (e.g., 0.11).
data.gas_heat_content_factor: Variable heat content factor to convert natural gas between CCF and Therms
data.gas_heat_content_factor_description: Enter the heat content factor used to convert CCF to Therms (e.g., 1.025).
data.gas_service_fee_description: Enter the fixed electric service fee amount (e.g., 13.00).

sensus_analytics_meter_address.name: Meter Address
sensus_analytics_meter_address.description: Street address of the utility meter.

sensus_analytics_last_read.name: Last Read
sensus_analytics_last_read.description: Timestamp of the last meter reading.

sensus_analytics_meter_latitude.name: Meter Latitude
sensus_analytics_meter_latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the meter's location.

sensus_analytics_meter_longitude.name: Meter Longitude
sensus_analytics_meter_longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the meter's location.

sensus_analytics_last_hour_timestamp.name: Last Hour Timestamp
sensus_analytics_last_hour_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last hour's data from the previous day.

sensus_analytics_gas_usage_unit.name: Gas Usage Unit
sensus_analytics_gas_usage_unit.description: Gas native unit of measurement chosen by Sensus Analytics.

sensus_analytics_gas_meter_id.name: Gas Meter ID
sensus_analytics_gas_meter_id.description: Unique identifier for the gas meter.

sensus_analytics_gas_latest_read_usage.name: Latest Read Gas Usage
sensus_analytics_gas_latest_read_usage.description: Latest cumulative gas usage recorded by the meter.

sensus_analytics_gas_billing_usage.name: Billing Gas Usage
sensus_analytics_gas_billing_usage.description: Total gas usage amount that has been billed.

sensus_analytics_gas_billing_cost.name: Gas Billing Cost
sensus_analytics_gas_billing_cost.description: Total cost of the billed gas usage.

sensus_analytics_gas_daily_fee.name: Gas Daily Fee
sensus_analytics_gas_daily_fee.description: Daily fee based on gas usage.

sensus_analytics_gas_last_hour_usage.name: Last Hour Gas Usage
sensus_analytics_gas_last_hour_usage.description: Gas usage for the last hour.

sensus_analytics_gas_meter_odometer.name: Gas Meter Odometer
sensus_analytics_gas_meter_odometer.description: Total cumulative gas usage recorded by the meter.

sensus_analytics_gas_hourly_timestamp.name: Gas Hourly Timestamp
sensus_analytics_gas_hourly_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last hour's data from the previous day.
